title: Cyberpunk Lucky Cat Glitch
colorScheme: Neon Green, Deep Black, Electric Blue
targetAudience: Tech enthusiasts, Gamers, Cyberpunk fans, Anyone who likes bold and unique designs
designElements: A stylized Maneki Neko (lucky cat) rendered in a pixelated, glitching style. Incorporate circuit board patterns subtly within the cat's design. Use Japanese text related to 'error' or 'connection' in a cyberpunk font. Add glowing neon green accents to the cat's eyes and collar.
aiPrompt: Create a cyberpunk style lucky cat t-shirt design. The cat should look like it's glitching, with pixelated edges and circuit board details. Use neon green, electric blue, and deep black colors. Include Japanese text with a cyberpunk font that translates to 'error' or 'connection'. The style should be edgy and modern.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Young adults, Streetwear enthusiasts, Fans of Japanese culture

title: Cyberpunk Skull Glitch
colorScheme: Neon green, electric blue, black, with white accents
targetAudience: Tech-savvy young adults, gamers, cyberpunk enthusiasts
designElements: A stylized skull design with glitching effects, circuit board patterns incorporated into the skull's features, neon-colored outlines, binary code elements, a stylized font with a cyberpunk feel.
aiPrompt: Create a cyberpunk-themed t-shirt design. The design should feature a stylized skull with glitching effects and circuit board patterns. Use neon green, electric blue, and black as the primary colors, with white accents. Incorporate binary code elements and a stylized font. The overall mood should be futuristic and rebellious.

title: Astral Jellyfish
colorScheme: Deep blues, purples, and teals with neon pink and yellow accents.
targetAudience: Children, marine biology enthusiasts, and people who love vibrant, dreamy designs.
designElements: A whimsical jellyfish silhouette with flowing tentacles made up of interconnected bubbles with a similar gradient effect to the original image. Bubbles could contain tiny stars, planets, or cosmic dust.
aiPrompt: Create an illustration of a jellyfish with glowing, bubble-like tentacles filled with stars and cosmic dust, set against a deep blue and purple gradient background. Use vibrant neon accents.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: People who like abstract art, science enthusiasts, anyone who likes colorful designs.
originalAnalysis.technique: Photography of oil and water mixture.

title: OFFLINE (Rebooting)
style: Minimalist with a glitch art influence
colorScheme: White or light grey shirt with black or dark grey text. Alternatively, a black shirt with white or light grey text.
targetAudience: Tech-savvy individuals, People seeking a digital detox, Humor-loving individuals
designElements: The word "OFFLINE" in a simple sans-serif font, enclosed in parentheses like the original shirt. The word "Rebooting" written below, with glitch art style pixelation or distortion applied to the text. A loading bar element could be added but in a deliberately slow or stalled state.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist T-shirt design. The design features the word 'OFFLINE' in parentheses, followed by 'Rebooting...' on the line below, the word Rebooting has a glitch/pixelated aesthetic. The overall style is clean and modern. Shirt color should be either white or black, with the text contrasting.

title: Celestial Peaks
colorScheme: Deep blues, purples, whites, and golds
targetAudience: Anyone who loves the outdoors, stargazers, dreamers
designElements: A stylized mountain range silhouetted against a vibrant, swirling night sky filled with stars and constellations. Include a subtle crescent moon peeking over the peaks. Perhaps add a vintage-style banner with a minimalist font.
aiPrompt: Create a vintage-style illustration of a mountain range silhouetted against a swirling, colorful night sky full of stars and constellations. A crescent moon should be visible. The color palette should consist of deep blues, purples, whites, and golds. Add a banner with a simple sans-serif font with the words 'Celestial Peaks'.

title: Retro Gaming Legends
colorScheme: Navy shirt with pixelated neon blue, pink, and green accents.
designElements: Pixelated image of classic video game characters (e.g., Mario, Pac-Man, Link). A banner above the characters that says 'Legends' in a retro pixel font. A small graphic of a joystick or console controller. Underneath the characters the text 'Insert Coin to Continue'.
aiPrompt: Create a t-shirt design featuring pixelated versions of iconic video game characters in a retro style. Include a banner with the word 'Legends' in a pixelated font. Add a small graphic of a joystick and the phrase 'Insert Coin to Continue' below the characters. Use a navy background with neon blue, pink, and green accents. High resolution.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Students, Alumni, Sports Fans, Western Enthusiasts

title: Retro Anime Ramen

targetAudience: Anime fans, Foodies, People who like retro style
designElements: Anime-style illustration of a bowl of ramen with chopsticks. Japanese text, stylized lettering.

Use a vintage anime style with vibrant colors like red, orange, and yellow on a cream or off-white t-shirt. The text should say Ramen Dream, Anime style.

title: Growth Through Darkness
colorScheme: Black, White, with a single accent color (e.g., Crimson Red or Deep Teal)
targetAudience: Individuals interested in self-improvement, alternative fashion, and overcoming adversity
designElements: A single, stark black silhouette of a thorny rose (or other resilient plant) emerging from a cracked or shattered geometric shape (e.g., cube, sphere). The accent color could highlight the thorns or a single petal. The words 'Growth Through Darkness' (or a similar phrase) are subtly incorporated, perhaps in a deconstructed or fractured typography.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist T-shirt design featuring a black silhouette of a thorny rose growing out of a shattered cube. Use a single accent color (crimson red) for the thorns. The phrase 'Growth Through Darkness' should be integrated subtly in a fractured sans-serif font. The background should be plain white.

originalAnalysis.technique: Digital printing, Distorted typography, Graphic overlay

title: Retro Sunset Surfer Van
colorScheme: Warm gradients (oranges, yellows, reds) blending into cooler tones (blues, purples) to represent a sunset. A faded/worn effect for a vintage look.
targetAudience: Surfers, Travelers, Van Life Enthusiasts, Adventure Seekers
designElements: A classic VW surfer van silhouette. The van is positioned in front of a stylized sunset with waves in the background. 'Get Lost' text incorporated in the design, possibly as the license plate on the van.
aiPrompt: Create a vintage T-shirt design featuring a VW surfer van silhouette against a vibrant sunset background with stylized waves. Use warm gradients transitioning to cooler colors. Incorporate the phrase 'Get Lost' as a license plate on the van. Add a faded, distressed effect for a retro feel.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Surfers, Beachgoers, Summer Lovers, Young Adults

title: Fractured Terrain
colorScheme: Earthy tones (browns, greens, greys) with a pop of bright orange or yellow to simulate molten rock
targetAudience: Outdoor enthusiasts, Hikers, Geologists, Nature lovers, People who appreciate abstract art
designElements: A shattered or fractured landmass pattern on one side of the shirt, resembling cracked earth or volcanic rock formations. Incorporate a subtle texture to mimic the feel of rough terrain.
aiPrompt: T-shirt design featuring abstract fractured earth pattern in earthy tones (browns, greens, grays) with bright orange accents. The pattern should appear on the left side of the shirt. Add subtle texture to resemble cracked rock. Sublimation print style.
